metadata.title: CVE-2017-6962 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in apng2gif 1.7. There is an integer overflowresulting in a heap-based buffer overflow. This is related to theread_chunk function making an unchecked addition of 12.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6962` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apng2gif - 1.8-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apng2gif package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8-0.1').
